nod.prompt: The subject gently nods their head in acknowledgment, subtle and natural movement, maintaining eye contact

wave.prompt: The subject waves hello with a friendly gesture, natural arm and hand movement, warm expression
wave.negative: distortion, blur, awkward arm position, frozen face

laugh.prompt: The subject laughs naturally, eyes crinkling with joy, shoulders moving slightly, genuine amusement
laugh.negative: distortion, unnatural expression, frozen features, creepy smile

think.prompt: The subject tilts their head thoughtfully to one side, considering something, subtle chin movement

surprise.prompt: The subject reacts with mild surprise, eyebrows raising, eyes widening slightly, mouth opening a bit
surprise.negative: distortion, extreme expression, horror face, unnatural

idle.prompt: The subject breathes naturally with very subtle movement, slight head sway, almost still but alive
idle.negative: frozen, statue-like, completely still, jerky movement

talking.prompt: The subject is speaking, natural lip movement, subtle facial expressions while talking
talking.negative: distortion, unnatural mouth, frozen expression, robotic

wink.prompt: The subject gives a playful wink with one eye, slight smile, charming expression
wink.negative: distortion, both eyes closing, creepy, unnatural
